name: Shirtinator
author: Frank Bültge

sections.description:
Insert your personal Shirtinator Creator wrapped into WordPress without any popup or iframe.

How it works:

Please visit the official website for further details and the latest information on this plugin.

Pemises

  • PHP 5
  • PEAR-package XML/RPC library
  • 720px min. width in the design

Acknowledgements

  • Thanks to Fat Cow for the belarussian language files.
sections.installation:
1. Unpack the download-package
  2. Upload folder include all files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Got to ‘Options’ menu submenu ‘Shirtinator’ and configure the plugin.
  5. Write a new page with the content <!--shirtinator--> .

See on the official website.
sections.faq:
Where can I get more information?

Please visit the official website for the latest information on this plugin.

I love this plugin! How can I show the developer how much I appreciate his work?

Please visit the official website and let him know your care or see the wishlist of the author.
sections.changelog:

Please see the older changes on version on the the official website!
